about_the_game:
SYNOPSIS

In the small town of Smileville, located in the state of Oregon, strange occurrences have begun following the emergence of a new church called Holy Eye. Every day, the police receive new reports of disappearances and murders of innocent townspeople. Against this backdrop of unsettling news, the influential corporation Underwood decides to launch a new TV show titled Paranormal Investigators on TV4 channel.

MAKE A VIDEO REPORT: SOLO OR COOP

You and your team will act as TV presenters, responsible for creating a video report that will satisfy the TV channel. You can work alone or invite your best friend, or gather a group of friends (up to 4 people).
In any case, your only goal is to complete the video report before dawn, and save your life along the way (although this is optional).

KEY FEATURES

•Video report: You should not only shoot a video report, but also upload it to your computer at the same time to free up space on the video camera, and it is also advisable to take a couple of pictures.

•Random map generation and modifiers: Each room in the house is randomly generated, which makes each gaming session unique and encourages repeat playthroughs. In addition, an additional PARANORMAL+ mode has been added, in which random modifiers are available that complicate the creation of a video report, but bring more income.

•Advanced Perk System, Choice of Classes and Characters: Become a unique player and find your own style by choosing up to three perks, a class with different bonuses and, of course, the character you will play as.

•Immersion and interactivity: Thanks to the use of 3D sound technology, the physics of objects inside the house that you can pick up and when dropped can break into small fragments will help you immerse yourself in the atmospheric game.

•Device breakdown systems: During the game, the player’s equipment will gradually break down due to paranormal activity (or the company just decided to save money on you) and you personally will have to repair them so that they start working properly again.

Voice recognition and voice chat: Not only can your friends hear you, but so can creatures, and here's a friendly tip: don't make a sound if you're hiding or...

short_description: Paranormal Investigators is a 4 player co-op horror. You and your team are the hosts of a local TV show and explore abandoned houses with paranormal activity. You must make a video report and survive until dawn.
